mapper.insert: insert into order_list (order_idx, m_idx, products, amounts, products_price, receiver, selnum, address, paid_price, request, paymentInfo, used_point) values (#{order_idx}, #{m_idx}, #{products}, #{amounts}, #{products_price}, #{receiver}, #{selnum}, #{address}, #{paid_price}, #{request}, #{paymentInfo}, #{used_point})
